characters.name: Flash Feather
characters.description: A baby Hippogriff that appears in My Little Pony The Movie merchandise. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: Flutter Cloud
characters.description: A baby Hippogriff that appears in My Little Pony The Movie merchandise. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: General Seaspray
characters.description: Appears in School Daze - Part 1 and School Daze - Part 2 as the general of Queen Novo's navy and Silverstream's royal escort. Also appears in A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem. He is a character in Gameloft's mobile game. His in-game description states, "A stalwart of Her Majesty Queen Novo's Royal Navy. Seaspray is the very model of an eagle-pony general. Just don't call him that to his face!" His name was previously used for a G1 Sea Pony and a G3 Earth pony mare and is similar to that of G1 Sea Pony Sea Spray. Voiced by Christopher Gaze.

characters.name: Silverstream
characters.description: See Silverstream.

characters.name: Sky Beak
characters.description: See Sky Beak and Ocean Flow.

characters.name:
Noble Hippogriff Guard
Stratus Skyranger
characters.description: A Hippogriff/seapony royal guard to Queen Novo in My Little Pony The Movie, The Stormy Road to Canterlot, and Gameloft's mobile game. Also appears on the subscription covers of My Little Pony: The Movie Prequel #1 (wing only) and #2. Has a toy figure. His design was reused for a seapony guard and the mobile game character "Charming Hippogriff".

characters.name:
Regal Hippogriff
S08E06 Unnamed Male Hippogriff #10
characters.description: Appears in Surf and/or Turf as a resident of Mount Aris and Sky Beak's opponent in the "Glad to Be a Hippogriff" Festival games. Also appears in The Ending of the End - Part 2. He is a character named "Regal Hippogriff" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as an enemy minion during the "Convocation of the Creatures!" event. His bio states "This lordly Hippogriff prefers the skies to the seas -- that helmet and breastplate get REALLY heavy underwater."

characters.name:
Hippogriff Friendship Student
S08E06 Unnamed Male Baby Hippogriff #2
characters.description: Appears in Surf and/or Turf as a resident of Mount Aris and Seaquestria. Also appears in The Last Problem. He is a character named "Hippogriff Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during the "Prank to the Future" event. His in-game description states "The School of Friendship's future student body consists of creatures of all kinds--including this little 'griff. Or is that 'seapony'?"
